actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prescribe procedures whereby a committee may request that a matter reported should be considered under a suspension of the rules.

summary.text: Provides, under the Rules of the House of Representatives, that no rules shall be suspended for the purpose of considering any matter reported from a committee unless the chairman and ranking minority member of the committee, or a majority of the committee, in open session, with a quorum present, by a rollcall vote, requests that such matter be considered by a suspension of the rules.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prescribe procedures whereby a committee may request that a matter reported should be considered under a suspension of the rules.
